thread.title: Year after 'Love Gov' audio, Robert Bentley denies resignation rumors: 'My story has not been told'
thread.title_full: Year after 'Love Gov' audio, Robert Bentley denies resignation rumors: 'My story has not been told'

author: Leada Gore | lgore@al.com
title: Year after 'Love Gov' audio, Robert Bentley denies resignation rumors: 'My story has not been told'
text: One year ago today, Gov. Robert Bentley apologized to the people of Alabama, admitting he made "inappropriate" comments to then-adviser Rebekah Caldwell Mason but denying the two had an affair.
